email.title: To Research Or Not To Research?
email.text:
This is the question!
Have you thought about doing a PhD and/or going into academia but you’re a bit uncertain what this is going to be like?
We’ll be hosting Q&A panel between academics and people that have a lot of experience in the industry (Robert Chatley, Paul Kelly and many others) answering your questions about a research career. Be that in academia or private companies, this type of career choice usually comes along with a lot of stereotypes and myths so we’re here to break it for you!
Join Zoom Meeting https://zoom.us/j/95945135597?pwd=TElxRmN1UG9DRHNwQXZJY0RSSmpoUT09
Meeting ID: `959 4513 5597`
Passcode: `8RKaTc`
